description: MCP server that extracts clean, structured content from web pages with anti-bot bypass capabilities.

FIRECRAWL_API_KEY.description: API key for Firecrawl service to bypass anti-bot measures

BRIGHTDATA_API_KEY.description: Bearer token for BrightData Web Unlocker service

STRATEGY_CONFIG_PATH.description: Path to markdown file containing scraping strategy configuration

OPTIMIZE_FOR.description: Optimization strategy for scraping: cost or speed

MCP_RESOURCE_STORAGE.description: Storage backend for saved resources: memory or filesystem

MCP_RESOURCE_FILESYSTEM_ROOT.description: Directory for filesystem storage (only used with filesystem type)

SKIP_HEALTH_CHECKS.description: Skip API authentication health checks at startup

LLM_PROVIDER.description: LLM provider for extract feature: anthropic, openai, openai-compatible

LLM_API_KEY.description: API key for the chosen LLM provider

LLM_MODEL.description: Specific model to use for extraction
